name: float block
author: Computy

sections.description:
The plugin displays floating down the block. In it, you can write the title and body text.
You can also insert a photo or video to.
You can put back the feedback form or links sponsorov.Plagin simple, so long description will not.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress
    plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Plugin Name screen to configure the plugin
